name: quick-text-viewer
title: Quick Text Viewer
description: Directly display text-based file content in Raycast, such as .txt, .md, and code files
author: fangbaiyu

commands.name: display-text-based-file-content
commands.title: Display Content of Text-based File
commands.subtitle: Quick Text Viewer
commands.description: Preview text-based file content directly in Raycast

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
